name: QBB project
tagline: QBB provides a set of libraries to facilitate the straightforward development of quantum mechanical simulations.
body:
### Welcome to QBB project

The Quantum Building Blocks (QBB) project aims at providing a powerful set of facilities to ease the
development of state-of-the-art quantum mechanical simulations.

Currently, we are busily preparing our online presence and the first chunks of work, which will
be released over the course of the next few month.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
